DataElement.preferredName: Imaging Procedure Unable To Do Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A response to questions which are necessary to allow clinical trial participation regarding the person's inability to undergo any technology or method that aids in the visualization of any biological process, cell, tissue or organ for use in screening, diagnosis, surgical procedures or therapy, as outlined in the study protocol.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Imaging Technique Unable to Do Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Any technology or method that aids in the visualization of any biological process, cell, tissue or organ for use in screening, diagnosis, surgical procedures or therapy._A response indicating that an individual is unable to do something._Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Tests that produce pictures of areas inside the body.

Concepts.definition: Any technology or method that aids in the visualization of any biological process, cell, tissue or organ for use in screening, diagnosis, surgical procedures or therapy.

Property.preferredName: Unable to Do Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria

Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: trial-specific criteria that a patient must meet to be enrolled.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.
